Code from online resources

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(patchwork)

dat <- read_csv(url("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cbrown5/example-ecological-data/refs/heads/main/data/benthic-reefs-and-fish/fish-coral-cover-sites.csv"))

head(dat)
summary(dat)

```

New chunk is cmd + shift + i

```{r}

# Define custom red-to-green palette
custom_colors <- c("#D32F2F", "#ff9900ff", "#4CAF50")

ggplot(dat, aes(x = cb_cover, y = pres.topa)) +
  geom_point(color = custom_colors[1], alpha = 0.6) +
  geom_smooth(method = "gam", color = custom_colors[3], fill = custom_colors[2]) +
  theme_minimal()

  ggplot(dat, aes(x = pres.habili, y = secchi)) +
  geom_point(color = custom_colors[1], alpha = 0.6) +
  geom_smooth(method = "gam", color = custom_colors[3], fill = custom_colors[2]) +
  theme_minimal()

```
